markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deeper Dabbler](/Feats.aspx?ID=2081) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 195 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Talisman Dabbler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=79)

**Prerequisites**
[Talisman Dabbler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2079)

</column>

---

With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day. You can create two additional talismans during your daily preparations.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time if you are 14th level or higher.
name: Deeper Dabbler
